name: Aya (itch)
description:
Explore a dark top-down maze with a flashlight. Find and collect the gems by shining the correct type of light on them, and see what message they spell for you.

You can play in the browser, and the only controls are the arrow keys. 

This game was made in a huge rush for the Lux jam and is missing most of the polish. Most disappointing to me was that I didn't have time to add sound or music.

Color is important for this game, and I apologize that there was not enough time in the jam to make this game accessible for people who experience certain forms of color blindness.
